int32_t.name: duration
int32_t.comment: remaining graphical frames to display this report in announcement bar

flag-bit.name: continuation
flag-bit.comment: When split into multiple lines, set on all but the first

stl-vector.name: report_unit_announcement_category
stl-vector.comment: vector must be same length as report_unid

struct-type.comment: allocated on the stack, included in df-structures to assist with disassembly

int16_t.name: display_timer
int16_t.comment: graphical frames for announcement bar to linger on last line with no new announcement
